scripts.build:css: postcss -u postcss-css-variables -u postcss-custom-media -u autoprefixer autoprefixer.browsers 'last 3 versions' autoprefixer.cascade false -u postcss-reporter --postcss-reporter.clearMessages true -u csswring --sourcemap -o assets/min/style-min.css assets/css/style.css
scripts.lint:css: postcss -u stylelint -q -u postcss-bem-linter --postcss-bem-linter.preset 'suit' --postcss-bem-linter.ignoreSelectors html. -u postcss-reporter --postcss-reporter.clearMessages true --dir assets/min/lint assets/css/**/*.css
scripts.watch:js: watch 'npm run lint:js && npm run build:js' assets/javascript --wait 5
scripts.watch:css: watch 'npm run lint:css && npm run build:css' assets/css --wait 5
